body.name: ECOS Laundry Detergent Liquid, 200 Loads - Dermatologist Tested Laundry Soap - Hypoallergenic, EPA Safer Choice Certified, Plant-Powered - Lavender, 100 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 23 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: CLIMATE POSITIVE AND SUSTAINABLE - Not only is this laundry detergent formula effective and kind to sensitive skin, but it's also biodegradable and pH-balanced.
100% VEGAN – Containing enough detergent for 200 loads of laundry, plant-powered ECOS Laundry Detergent is both cruelty-free and vegan, making it an ideal choice for planet-conscious households.
PARABEN AND PHOSPHATE FREE - Unlike most conventional laundry detergents, ECOS does not contain any harsh chemicals or ingredients that can pollute water when it enters the ecosystem.
DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED AND HYPOALLERGENIC - ECOS Laundry Detergent is an effective yet gentle cleaning solution for clothes that is suitable for families with skin allergies and sensitivities.

CLEAN FORMULAS WITH VISIBLE RESULTS - Since 1967, ECOS has created safer, powerful products by using enzymes found in nature. Our liquid laundry detergents are made in a carbon neutral, water neutral, TRUE Platinum Zero Waste factory using 100% renewable energy.
CERTIFIED SAFER CHOICE - Safer Choice certification means that the product perfoms well and contains ingredients that are safer for human health and the environment.
WOMEN OWNED - ECOS is a Women-Owned and Led Company
BLACK OWNED - ECOS is a Black-Owned and Led Company
body.description: ECOS Laundry Detergent is safer for you and the planet. ECOS's hypoallergenic formula protects fabrics, brightens whites and guards colors using the power of coconut – a highly renewable resource with natural cleaning properties. This formula is effective yet gentle enough for all fabrics –– even your delicates. It also softens fabrics without the need for added fabric softener, saving you money and time. ECOS Laundry Detergent is 100% Vegan and made without parabens, phosphates or dyes. Hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested, ECOS Laundry Detergent is U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified, meaning it is made without harmful ingredients and the formula is completely biodegradable and greywater and septic safe, helping keep our planet and waterways clean. Plus, each 100 oz. container offers 100 loads of laundry cleaning. It’s the perfect alternative to conventional detergents continaing harsh chemicals and is effective on any type of fabric from delicate linens to everyday clothing. ECOS Laundry Detergent also works great on large laundry loads and even dark colors, so you can wash with confidence and get out the toughest stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was using Tide Pods and they reformulated it making me itchy and it smelled awful, so I tried ECOS. I waited to write my review until I washed a load of towels since many of the reviews indicate that it made their towels uncomfortable. I add vinegar to my wash as a fabric softener and my towels came out just fine! The lavender scent smells wonderful but not overpowering. I felt like my clothes smell nice and were clean and soft. Plus no more itching! I like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product, leaks in shipping though
reviews.reviewText: I don't mind sharing but not with the packaging box!! One out of every five deliveries has leaked! Had to send the last one back as it also damaged other items in my delivery. Sadly now I have to reorder out of subscription and it will cost me more!I love this product and appreciate that it is hypoallergenic. Has a minimal smell which I appreciate as well. Works well and makes clothes feel soft and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unscented and Pure for Sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I cannot tolerate chemicals, perfumes, carpet fresh, scented shampoo... you get it. Hives, wheezing, the whole bit. I have epi pens available because another brand of free n clear detergent caused anaphylaxis once. (They no longer sell that brand). I couldn't even use the blue, yellow and white bottle stuff advertised and backed by dermatologists. Tried this and it's amazing! No rash. No itching. No wheezing. And, it does a good job cleaning my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice but can be found at a better value in store
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the lemongrass scent because I have not seen this fragrance in store. The bottles arrived without any leakage but as I opened the tops there was definitely some spillage due to transit. These bottle load counts can be found at a better value in store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little goes a long way. I love that it comes in a two pack. A great product for clothes washing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A more natural alternative that actually cleans the cloths
reviews.reviewText: We have tried many "natural" type low fragrance laundry detergents. Many of them didn't do well with the main purpose of their existence - getting cloths clean. This one work very good and smells good too. Price here is reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and safe ingredients
reviews.reviewText: Tried all healthy detergents & this is the best so far. Cheaper than others and does its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I looked for laundry detergent which is safe for skin. This is a great product and I like the smell. This is my second buy and would like to keep using this brand.
Ecos jabón líquido tiene un suave aroma y es respetuoso con el medio ambiente como también rinde mucho en cada carga de la lavadora .

How I know that it cleans well, is that my washing machine is cleaner ever since I used this detergent. None of the oil residue that other products leave in washing machine. If it cleans all those oil residue in washing machine, it would surely clean my clothes well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonderful Product, Hard to Find, Pleasant fragrance!
reviews.reviewText: The shipping was fast, in sturdy cardboard boxes with many air filled cushioning pouches. However, some of the jugs were placed on their side, and the liquid leaked, despite there being sealing tape around the caps. I lost about 5 capfuls of liquid from each of 3 jugs, and one jug had stripped threads at the neck. Cap could not be secured fully.If there was a bold instruction with arrows pointing UP printed on the boxes, the leakage might have been prevented.
Product itself is excellent. However arrived badly spilt.

I usually buy this brand at Costco, cheaper to get it there than online but i was happy to save the trip there and suprised that it didn't make too bad of a mess. There was a little bit that leaked out of their leakproof tape but nothing to be concerned about!
